remarks: Inference removing a negated conjunct in a disjunction of an antecedent if this conjunct is part of the disjunction.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 3-Nov-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 21-Sep-2018.)
statement:
jaoi2.1 $e |- ( ( ph \/ ( -. ph /\ ch ) ) -> ps ) $.
jaoi2 $p |- ( ( ph \/ ch ) -> ps ) $.
